item.description: Hey guys! Let's treat our pups to a special day where it's all about them! February has 2 FUN Holidays to celebrate the ones we Love to Love...Valentine's Day & Love Your Pet Day! Whether we shower them with Smooches at the Pooches Kissing Booth or watch them play "Cupid Says" or Red Rover I know we will all have plenty of chances to show our Best Friends how much we LOVE them! Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP< Bordatella
item.name: Love is in the Air at Best Friends Pet Care!
